title: Hong Kong Exchanges drops $39 billion offer to buy LSE
text:
FILE PHOTO: The name of Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited is displayed at the entrance in Hong Kong, China January 24, 2018. REUTERS/Bobby Yip/File Photo

(Reuters) - Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd (0388.HK) said on Tuesday it will not make an offer for London Stock Exchange Group (LSE.L), a month after it unveiled a $39 billion (31.7 billion pounds) takeover approach for the bourse operator.

“The Board of HKEX continues to believe that a combination of LSEG and HKEX is strategically compelling,” HKEX said in a statement.
description: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd <0388.HK> said on Tuesday it will not make an offer for London Stock Exchange Group , a month after it unveiled a $39 billion (31.7 billion pounds) takeover approach for the bourse operator.
